details.name: Saktola Embankment under Water Resource Department.
details.location: At Village Borathiabari under Mangaldai Revenue Circle.
details.remarks: New Breach Extended another 15 m at Saktola left bank embankment at Ch. 1200 m at around 1.30 AM as per WRD department. Dated 16/06/2022. Due to heavy rainfall at the upper catchment and breach of DRDA bund on  Noanadi at udalguri , huge discharge of flood water is flowing through the Saktola river resulting in high rise in water level. The flood water overtopped the cofferdam structure built at the breached site last night. Though the newly built structure is withstanding  in support of BType bags, the overtopped flow developed a new flow line at the down stream and continuing flow through this new way.

details.remarks:
